title: Touhou12.3 + 10.5
description:
Just open with utorrent then open the rar file with winrar.

If not all characters are useable in 2 player mode then go to the 10.5 Scarlet Weather Rhapsody folder copy the location in the window's address bar.  

 (ex) (C:UsersyourpcDesktopTouhou 12.3 + SWRTouhou 12.3 - HisoutensokuTouhou 10.5 - Scarlet Weather Rhapsody),

 then go to the 12.3 folder and look for and open the the configex123 file then look for path= paste the location info you copyed on the same line as the path= (do the same for the file_vs= and the file_story= )after you paste the location, save the file.

 Then if you wish to play the game in English open the th123e application file.
